custom.grouptype.heading: Group Type
custom.grouptypedetails.public: Anyone may view and join automatically
custom.grouptypedetails.premiumlocked: Messages/posts are not visible to non-members (Invite-Only)
custom.grouptypedetails.open: Open to all visitors for reading and replying
custom.groupsettinghelp.disablejoin: Members will have to be invited manually
custom.groupconfirm.grantownership: Are you sure you want to make this user an owner of this group?
custom.groupconfirm.removeownership: Are you sure you want to remove this user as an owner of this group?
custom.groupconfirm.grantmoderator: Are you sure you want to make this user a moderator of this group?
custom.groupconfirm.removemoderator: Are you sure you want to remove this user as a moderator of this group?
